items.headline: ‘I changed my will to deter vultures’: I’m in my 60s and disabled. Do I impoverish myself to qualify for Medicaid?
items.summary_en: “I pay my taxes and insurance, donate money and personal belongings.”

items.headline: What Jimmy Kimmel said in his first show back may not matter. Disney has already been hammered by the culture wars.
items.summary_en: The decision to pull Kimmel off the air sparked calls for a boycott from his supporters, and the move to bring him back has angered conservatives, putting Disney in an unwinnable position.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Jimmy Kimmel has now returned to network TV. Other outspoken American workers may not be so fortunate.
items.summary_en: Yes, your employer can fire you for your views on Charlie Kirk and Jimmy Kimmel.

items.headline: I’m retiring at 63 with $1.5 million saved. Is 70/30 equities/bonds too risky?
items.summary_en: “My spouse and I have a combined $5,500 in monthly Social Security payments and a $2,900-a-month pension.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘I haven’t filed taxes in 20 years’: I’m 55 and about to get laid off. I’ve $1 million in crypto. Am I in big trouble?
items.summary_en: “I have $800,000 split across two 401(k) plans and a $69,000 lump-sum pension.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: I’m 70 and have Alzheimer’s. My son’s girlfriend put $750 worth of lottery tickets on a credit card I gave him. What can I do?
items.summary_en: “I contacted the credit-card company, but was advised they could not reimburse me for the theft.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Sure, there’s a risk of a bubble in AI stocks, so invest in them, says Wells Fargo strategist
items.summary_en: Wells Fargo’s chief equity strategist Ohsung Kwon said the AI trade will continue to dominate stock market gains, until this beaten-down area of the economy starts to show signs of life.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘I am mentally stuck’: My daughter has a financially reckless spouse. How do I protect her?
items.summary_en: “I am afraid they will end up destitute and homeless.”
